overview: Recorded live in 1978, Never Say Die is a defining moment in Black Sabbath's history. This unique concert is one of Sabbath's final performances with the original line-up of Ozzy Osbourne, Tony Iommi, Geezer Butler and Bill Ward. Setlist: 1. Symptom Of The Universe  2. War Pigs  3. Snow Blind  4. Never Say Die  5. Black Sabbath  6. Dirty Women  7. Rock And Roll Doctor  8. Electric Funeral  9. Children Of The Grave  10. Paranoid
title: Black Sabbath: Never Say Die
